mapper.select: SELECT channel_id as channelId, UP_MERCH_NO as upMerchNo, UP_MERCH_KEY as upMerchKey, MIN_PRICE as minPrice, MAX_PRICE as maxPrice, loop_robin as loopRobin, weight as weight FROM VC_A1_CHANNEL_SUBNO WHERE del_flag = 0 and status =1 AND UP_MERCH_NO IN (SELECT up_merch_key FROM vc_a1_supplier_subno WHERE STATUS=1 AND del_flag=0 GROUP BY up_merch_key) AND channel_id = #{channelId} AND IFNULL(DAY_TRA_AMOUNT,0) <= IFNULL(DAY_QUOTA_AMOUNT,0) AND IFNULL(TRA_AMOUNT,0) <= IFNULL(QUOTA_AMOUNT,0) ORDER BY SEQ ASC,id DESC

SELECT channel_id as channelId, UP_MERCH_NO as upMerchNo, UP_MERCH_KEY as upMerchKey, MIN_PRICE as minPrice, MAX_PRICE as maxPrice, loop_robin as loopRobin, weight as weight FROM VC_A1_CHANNEL_SUBNO WHERE del_flag = 0 and status =1 AND UP_MERCH_NO IN (SELECT up_merch_key FROM vc_a1_supplier_subno WHERE STATUS=1 AND del_flag=0 GROUP BY up_merch_key) AND channel_id = #{channelId} AND IFNULL(DAY_TRA_AMOUNT,0) <= IFNULL(DAY_QUOTA_AMOUNT,0) AND IFNULL(TRA_AMOUNT,0) <= IFNULL(QUOTA_AMOUNT,0) ORDER BY SEQ ASC,id DESC

SELECT channel_id as channelId, UP_MERCH_NO as upMerchNo, UP_MERCH_KEY as upMerchKey, MIN_PRICE as minPrice, MAX_PRICE as maxPrice, SUB_TRA_START_TIME as subTraStartTime, SUB_TRA_END_TIME as subTraEndTime FROM VC_A1_CHANNEL_SUBNO WHERE del_flag = 0 and status =1 AND channel_id = #{channelId} AND IFNULL(DAY_TRA_AMOUNT,0) <= IFNULL(DAY_QUOTA_AMOUNT,0) AND IFNULL(TRA_AMOUNT,0) <= IFNULL(QUOTA_AMOUNT,0) ORDER BY
LAST_ORDER_TIME ASC,
SEQ ASC limit 5

SELECT CONCAT(o.up_merch_no , ',',o.up_merch_key) as up_merch_no FROM vc_online_order o WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.channel_id = #{channelId} AND o.STATUS = 1 AND o.TRA_AMOUNT = #{traAmount} AND o.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN DATE_ADD(SYSDATE(), INTERVAL -#{lastOrderExpiredTime} SECOND) AND SYSDATE()

SELECT a.channel_id AS channelId, a.UP_MERCH_NO AS upMerchNo, a.STATUS AS STATUS, a.DAY_QUOTA_AMOUNT AS dayQuotaAmount, b.`PAY_URL` AS payUrl FROM VC_A1_CHANNEL_SUBNO a LEFT JOIN vc_a1_channel b ON a.`channel_id`=b.id WHERE a.del_flag = 0
AND UP_MERCH_NO = #{upMerchNo}

SELECT channel_id as channelId, UP_MERCH_NO as upMerchNo, UP_MERCH_KEY as upMerchKey, MIN_PRICE as minPrice, MAX_PRICE as maxPrice, loop_robin as loopRobin, weight as weight, USER_ID as userId, name as name, BANK_NO as bankNo, cardIdx as cardIdx, BANK_MARK as bankMark, REMARK as remark, REMARKS as remarks FROM VC_A1_CHANNEL_SUBNO WHERE del_flag = 0 AND status = 1 AND UP_MERCH_NO = #{upMerchNo} limit 1
mapper.update: UPDATE VC_A1_CHANNEL_SUBNO a SET DAY_TRA_AMOUNT=0, LAST_DAY = current_date()
UPDATE VC_A1_CHANNEL_SUBNO a SET DAY_QUOTA_AMOUNT=#{dayQuotaAmount},update_date = sysdate() WHERE up_merch_no=#{upMerchNo}
